title.zh_hk: 經典的回合制戰棋遊戲

content.en: Soul Dier is a classic JRPG style turn-based tactics game inspired by the trails (kiseki) series and many other games. Move, attack, skill, item, and wait – use all the actions you are familiars with to destroy the evils!

story: Beneath the fading town of Dirtmouth sleeps a vast, ancient kingdom. Many are drawn beneath the surface, searching for riches, or glory, or answers to old secrets.As the enigmatic Knight, you’ll traverse the depths, unravel its mysteries and conquer its evils.
